title: why does irelia /xin heal on structures ,turrets ,inhib ,nexus  but aatrox cant?

replies.body:
I feel like it's for "thematic reasons". Xin and Irelia's healing is supposed to come from within, whereas Aatrox's healing is essentially vampirism.

Alternatively it's just because Irelia and Xin Zhao are very old in comparison to Aatrox and back then Riot were more free with stuff like lifestealing off buildings.

> [{quoted}](name=MotherTeresa1910,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=0PYovGYu,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2015-06-15T15:31:53.797+0000)
>
> I feel like it's for "thematic reasons". Xin and Irelia's healing is supposed to come from within, whereas Aatrox's healing is essentially vampirism.

Turrets are people too!
Tryndamere's healing comes from within, why the fuck can't he gain fury from structures?
Because normally you punch walls when you're already angry and want to blow off some steam.
Because Irelia and Xin's heals are both flat amounts unless Xin goes an off build.  If Aatrox did it it would be OP as balls

Only Irelia has flat amount on her healing passive.

Ap Xin can tank even fountain turret while healing himself.

**Imo** Riot had no idea how Aatrox should look like when they made him, thus he feels like uncoocked raw meat that kinda stinks.

> Imo Riot had no idea how Aatrox should look like when they made him, thus he feels like uncoocked raw meat that kinda stinks.


its not as much as yyour opinion as its a fact 

aatrox's design is unrefined
{{champion:114}} such unrefined STYLE

He and Fiora actually suffer the same issues. Lore wise they are both elegant, precise, and extremely dangerous. In game, they just right click really hard. They don't match the skill level that their lores make them deserve.

Well, Fiora uses her ult...
I mean, it's more useful than Aatrox's
yeah, more useful, but still equally unskillful.
Fun times :)

AP Xin, Ultimate Backdoor Man XXX.

God that build is hilarious.
The better question is why can Pantheons passive block turret shots but Fioras W cant?
better question is why does pantheon still have that passive? shit is retarded in lane.
That passive is like 90% of why you would even consider picking Pantheon.
The other ten percent is Underwear Pantheon.
even better question is why throwing spear q counts as a basic attack towards sheild

Because W fully charges the passive and otherwise every spell counts towards stacking the passive once?

At least bother to read the tooltip.
Because it is specifically coded to be able to block turrets.

Because Pantheon's shield is magically infused with attributes that allow Turret projectiles to be blocked. 
Fiora's Parry is her parrying, not blocking attacks. 

This idea falls apart the moment you mention Braum though

The mustache man (Braum, this name could also be Draven, but...), cannot block turret shots because that would allow him to tower dive with his ADC too easily.

To paraphrase riot employees in an article about Braum, he was made as a defensive support, and allowing him to take reduced damage on multiple towershots aimed at his ADC went against his champion concept.
Doesn't aatrox heal from stealing the blood of his victims? So the structures, turrets, inhib, nexus don't have blood, which is why he doesn't heal.
HOW DO YOU KNOW TOWERS DONT HAVE BLOOD HUH? HAVE YOU ACTUALLY CRACKED ONE OPEN BEFO-....Oh, you have...oh nvm
Blitz and Ori are robots, he still heals from them. Aatrox should be the biggest counter to Vlad then since Vlad has so much blood.

Ironically, Aatrox is one of the best people to pick to beat up Vlad

This is in regards to laning and dueling, not teamfighting =/

Actually, Vlad beats Aatrox.

Vlad has much better sustain and outscales him hard. He can avoid Aatrox's knockup with his pool. He is also ranged.

Range does not beat Aatrox. He's one of the better melees to deal with ranged tops like Vlad

Also, if Aatrox is outsustained by Vlad, that is a VERY bad Aatrox. An Aatrox should put the fear of god in a Vlad right at lvl 1, Q him at lvl 1 and trade autos, hit level 2 first, then QE flash forced. Bring Ignite/TP. Risky? Yes, but this is what wards are for

Yes, Vlad does outscale Aatrox, but the whole point of picking Aatrox vs Vlad is to shut down that goddamn Vlad and bring spitpush pressure

He's not my first pick vs Vlad, but so far I've never lost to Vlad as Aatrox
But Vlad has the same theme, so essentially they would be taking each others blood until they somehow die to overdose of opponents blood
Okay, then I vote that Aatrox should not heal off of champions that don't have blood.
Game balance, not thematic logic.
Thematic logic that translates into game balance, your argument is invalid.

Right, so {{champion:8}} shouldn't be able to heal off of {{champion:53}} , and {{champion:267}} should damage {{champion:63}} when she heals him...
Sorry but thematic's don't always translate to in game balance, or league would be a clusterfuck.
Well duh, who said something like that?!

> [{quoted}](name=Ironhold,realm=EUNE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=0PYovGYu,comment-id=000400000000,timestamp=2015-06-15T21:11:04.996+0000)
>
> Thematic logic that translates into game balance

sounds like you did...

Oh really? Where on earth did I say it ALWAYS translates into game balance? 

Sorry honey, you're barking up the wrong tree, goodbye.

Something like that isn't as easily implied
You should specify that in the future, because as it stands, you just said "Thematic logic translates into game balance"
Just a plain statement.
Be more specific in the future, for all our's sake
because structures don't have "blood" for aatrox to absorb
{{champion:54}} {{champion:53}} {{champion:154}} {{champion:412}} {{champion:3}} {{champion:9}} among the other things without blood.

Irelia's true damage doesn't apply on structures, Xin's armor shredding doesn't apply on structures, Aatrox's life-steal doesn't proc off structures, Aatrox's bonus damage doesn't apply on structures.
? ok but their healing does. what are you talking about exactly?
It's because the first two have heals that go off on attack, while aatroxes goes off on hit. Most on hit effects don't work against structures.

I'm not sure they are supposed to. It seems odd to let them.

I suppose towers don't bleed?
im sure xin does not challenge and duel the turret or irelia draw spirit of turret
They are suppose to. They have to been that way for ages. Their abilities don't count as lifesteal which is why they heal. Different mechanics then aatrox.
aatrox doesnt even get to win lane to be able to hit the enemy laners tower. nice bait.
Do you even play Aatrox?
played him once after his nerf. rip.
You forgot Galio. With enough AP, CDR, and resists Galio gains health easily from the turret. In URF he was invincible.
aatrox heal is stronger
